title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Friday 22 December 2017 - BBC News

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from east midlands live .
we will be back from 08:00 on wednesday after boxing day .
in the mean time , merry christmas everybody !

documents.title: christmas weather for the east midlands
text: it 's another mild night with some early mist and fog forming .
minimum temperature of 8c ( 46f ) .
although some brightness is possible on saturday it will be another generally cloudy day , the westerly wind will strengthen slightly .
maximum temperature of 11c ( 52f ) .
remaining cloudy , mild and mostly dry on christmas eve and christmas day but a spell of more unsettled weather arrives christmas day night .
temperatures will return to normal from boxing day onwards .
author: Anna Church
Weather Presenter, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: christmas traffic beginning to build
text: traffic is beginning to build around the three east midlands cities this afternoon as people prepare for the christmas getaway .
the red roads show where it is particularly heavy - thankfully , the motorways are looking surprisingly clear for what 's dubbed frantic friday .
that 's expected to change later on though with an estimated 1.3 million extra travellers to add to the usual traffic and the rac urging people to avoid long journeys .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: your east midlands winter skies
text: for many of us it 's almost time to put your feet up for a few days and enjoy the christmas break .
here are some of the best shots from around the region today .
the sun setting in east markham in nottinghamshire :
a highland cow in baslow in derbyshire .
and the sun dropping behind the trees in breedon-on-the-hill in leicestershire .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: benefits nurse cautioned over abuse
text: benefits nurse cautioned over abuse

documents.title: extra council tax could save more police officer jobs
text: leicestershire 's police and crime commissioner is asking people if they 're prepared to pay an extra pound a month towards policing .
lord willy bach has launched an online survey today - the council tax increase would mean an average contribution of £ 200 per household going towards leicestershire police .
without it we calculated that in a couple of years time we 'd have to lose another 250 officers - that 's on top of the 547 that we 've already lost .
that 's a big , big loss . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: your comments : what 's not a dogs christmas dinner
text: as expected - there 's been a lot of love for marty mcfly on facebook today .
he helped us demonstrate what festive food would make him , and other dogs , poorly over christmas .
reggie williams said : `` love my pugs .
they do ok on doggie food and treats . ''
amanda day said : `` do n't worry , mr woofit wo n't be getting any of those but he 's getting turkey and a little pig in blanket . ''
victoria hibbert said : `` bitey face brienne is having chicken and broccoli , carrots and potato no gravy though because of the onion in it . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: controlled blast after 'terror plot ' raids
text: controlled blast after 'terror plot ' raids

documents.title: children passengers in drink-drive crash
text: there were two children , aged five and three , in this car when it crashed in ripley earlier .
the driver , a 36-year-old man , was breathalysed by police and found to be more than double the legal alcohol limit .
it happened at 12:15 at the roundabout where the a610 meets the a38 .
the road was closed until 15:00 as a lamp post needed cutting down .
luckily no one was injured but the driver was arrested and remains in police custody .
police have said they are also making a `` child safeguarding referral '' .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: travel : a42 crash cleared
text: the rtc is now clear and both lanes of the a42 north are running .
many thanks to @ twitterid for their assistance .
# team # arv
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: man admits stabbing 21-year-old to death
text: a man has pleaded guilty to murdering a 21-year-old man in nottingham .
remee jarrett , 30 , also admitted attempted wounding with intent to cause serious injury to another man , also aged 21 , during the same stabbing attack in st ann 's .
he also admitted possession of an offensive weapon .
reuben morris-laing was found with a single stab wound to the abdomen outside a premier express shop in robin hood street in march .
he died at the queen 's medical centre in the early hours of the next day .
jarrett , of st ann 's , had previously denied murdering mr morris-laing , and was due to face trial next year , but changed his plea today at nottingham crown court
he was remanded to appear at the same court for sentencing in january .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: fight leaves man with fractured eye socket
text: a man has been left with a fractured eye socket and cuts to his face after he was attacked during a christmas night out .
the 40-year-old was punched in the face outside a takeaway in glossop , derbyshire , at about 02:45 on sunday after he intervened in a fight .
pc gareth podmore said : `` this was a particularly nasty assault that has had a profound affect on the victim . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: breakingcontrolled explosion after terror arrests
text: the army bomb squad has carried out a controlled explosion in chesterfield after a series of terror arrests .
material found at a property in the town , where a cordon remains in place , was taken to a `` nearby safe location '' to be destroyed , counter terrorism policing north east said .
no premises were evacuated .
four men , aged 31 , 22 , 36 and 41 , were arrested during raids at addresses in sheffield and chesterfield on tuesday .
police have until christmas day to charge or release the men .
the army bomb squad was deployed to mermaid tradition fish and chip shop on sheffield road in chesterfield following the raids .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: arrests after armed robbery at jewellers
text: two people have been arrested after a jewellers in leicestershire was robbed earlier this week .
four men in balaclavas , wielding an axe and a crowbar , entered cathy stevens jewellery in ratby road , groby , at about 17:30 on tuesday .
staff , who were in the shop at the time , were not injured but were left `` shaken '' , police said .
the gang left the store with jewellery in a red ford focus which was found in the village that evening .
the axe was recovered from the shop , while the crowbar was found with the car .
two men , aged 21 and 22 , were arrested last night on sus of conspiracy to commit robbery .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: a42 crash : picture from scene
text: warwickshire police are at the scene of the two-vehicle crash on the a42 between ashby-de-la-zouch and appleby magna in leicestershire - close to where it becomes the m42 .
now assisting @ twitterid with an rtc on # m42 # roadspolicing # specialcontribution ba
@ twitterid @ twitterid i witnessed this accident , do you need anything from me ?
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: travel : fog warning after a42 crash
text: this is likely to cause some big delays on one of the biggest travel days of the festive period .
lane 1 ( of 2 ) closed # a42 northbound between j11 # applebymagna and j12 # ashbydelazouch due to a 2 vehicle collision .
@ twitterid and @ twitterid are on scene with long delays on # m42 .
please drive carefully as you can see there 's thick fog in the area .
@ twitterid i witnessed the above accident , do you need anything from me ?
- hi mark , i do n't think we need any info from you , but maybe @ twitterid will tweet you directly .
thank you + merry christmas .
do n't suppose you have any information on the guy who was injured ?
hoping he was ok .
did n't look too good .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: christmas punch holes for festive travellers
text: this is snow joke .
tiny christmas-themed holes are being punched into train tickets this festive season .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: 'i 'm not coming back ' - traders blast leicester christmas market
text: the new location for the christmas market in leicester has left some traders wishing they had n't bothered .
author: Leicester Mercury

documents.title: appeal to find 'rightful owner ' of ring
text: missing a ring ?
one has been found in oakham market square .
one of our team found a ring in # oakham market square this morning .
if you recognise it , please get in touch so that we can arrange to return it to its rightful owner .
judging by the wear they are very attached to it .
pls rt @ twitterid # rutland
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: appeal to find man on bail for assault
text: police say they are trying to trace 22-year-old benjamin lawson , who was arrested on sus of assault in warsop and released on bail , but failed to turn up as expected .
it 's thought he could be in the grimsby area , but he also has links to warsop , mansfield , sheffield and cleethorpes .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: another photo released in pregnant prisoner appeal
text: police have release another photo of sefora tanase - the pregnant prisoner who is `` unlawfully at large '' after escaping from royal derby hospital .
tanase , 19 , is a prisoner at foston hall , currently serving a sentence for theft offences .
she is of romanian nationality and has strong links to the birmingham area .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: watch : burglar steals hair straighteners
text: a burglar has been caught on camera breaking into a hairdressers on castle street in hinckley and stealing four pairs of ghd hair straighteners .
it happened in the early hours of monday 11 december .
police are appealing for anyone with information on the burglary to get in touch with them .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: sign explains 'why barmaid is being nice to you '
text: this sign , which has appeared at nottingham pub , the lion at basford , is doing the rounds on social media
we should n't have to have this sign up but we want to make sure the message gets across .
yep , making polite conversation & smiling while pouring a pint clearly means you are madly in love with the middle aged punter .
could have done with this in my bar days !
i 'm from leicester but i might have to make a trip over there just to shake your hand for this .
only two choices ?
ca n't we come up with a few more creative ones ?
how about , for starters you remind her of her gentle senile grampy .
p.s .
i 'm not a pig , i just liked the
@ twitterid @ twitterid advice we could have used a few years ago .
@ twitterid
love it .
what message is that exactly ? ?
inappropriate behaviour is inappropriate behaviour whether it be in a pub or the workplace school college etc .
finding someone attractive is n't illegal last time i checked nor is it perverted
it makes the point , does n't it ?
brilliant !
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: m1 crash : all lanes re-open
text: it 's after an overturned car damaged the barriers this morning .
recovery and barriers are complete on the # m1 and all lanes have re-opened between j23 and j23a .
earlier delays have cleared and traffic is flowing well .
thanks for your patience during this incident .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: car bursts into flames in police chase
text: car bursts into flames in police chase

documents.title: medals stolen in burglary
text: first world war medals have been stolen from a house in nottinghamshire , police have said .
other items , including a jar of coins , were taken in a burglary in crompton street , teversal , at some point between 17:00 on tuesday and 10:00 on wednesday .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: what not to feed your dog at christmas
text: what not to feed your dog at christmas

documents.title: birch : silva is 'a little midfield dynamo '
text: it sounds like `` the birch '' is excited to see adrien silva play for leicester city in the new year .
the portuguese midfielder was signed by the foxes in the summer transfer window but the club was 14 seconds too late to register the new player .
in january his international clearance will go through .
leicester city 's club ambassador alan birchenall said : `` i think this player is like a little midfield dynamo .
i 've seen technically he 's a terrific player and it 's exciting to think we 've got him available '' .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: toddler sat 'in the footwell ' of car
text: it will be christmas without a car for a family caught breaking many driving laws in derby .
the driver was on the wrong side of the road , the passenger had a three-month-old baby on her lap and there was a one-year-old sat in a footwell , police said .
to make matters worse - the car was insured to a false address in hunstanton `` to get a cheaper policy '' according to officers .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: lane re-opens after m1 crash
text: if you 're heading north on the m1 this might make delays near loughborough a little better .
an extra lane has now been opened on the northbound side of the # m1 towards the scene of the earlier # accident between j23 and j23a , but one lane is still closed there north of # loughborough .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: burnt out car chased for 12 miles
text: a car that burst into flames in stapleford last night had been chased from hucknall , over 12 miles away , police have said .
they were called to saint john 's crescent in hucknall about 20:05 to a report of a theft from a vehicle .
after a chase along the m1 , a car connected to the thefts was abandoned and caught fire in nottingham road .
two men were arrested nearby .
enquiries are ongoing , a nottinghamshire police spokesman said .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: flooded family return home in time for christmas
text: a family from derby are back home just in time for christmas after this burst water pipe outside their house in march caused such serious damage they had to leave .
the gregory family home , in mansfield road , derby , was one of two that were particularly badly damaged and flooded .
at the time leigh gregory said : `` we escaped to the top floor - myself , my wife , the children a dog and two cats - and were stuck there till about 08:00 .
`` obviously we could see what was happening through the window - water was coming into the first floor bedroom and a landing window .
it was a bit of a mess really . ''
nine months on the family are back home .
mr gregory said the roof and the front of the house needed a lot of repair work .
three months was spent drying the house out before it could be re plastered and decorated .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: christian agrees new deal with outlaws
text: christian agrees new deal with outlaws

documents.title: burst water pipe stops supplies
text: if there 's nothing coming out of the taps this morning , this could be why .
a severn trent water spokesman said : `` our teams are out on site now and will work hard to get this pipe fixed and everything back to normal as quickly as possible . ''
customers within the ng13 area of whatton , nottingham may be without water this morning , or experiencing a lower pressure than normal due to a burst water pipe on conery lane .
updates can be found here :
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: bitcoin machine in leicester newsagent
text: have you heard of bitcoins ?
it 's a bit like virtual money , which can be transferred from person to person and kept in a digital wallet on a computer or mobile device .
this shop in leicester has become one of the first to install a bitcoin cash machine .
you can use it to buy and sell bitcoins .
at the moment a whole bitcoin costs just over £ 10,000 but you can get a bit of a bitcoin for about £ 25 - that would give you about £ 9 in bitcoin currency .
rakesh odera from kesh 's wines in braunstone said he got the machine to increase footfall to the shop .
he said he 's had a `` good response '' to it so far and that he 's already had a few people come to the shop especially to use it .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: judges overturn 2013 rape conviction
text: judges overturn 2013 rape conviction

documents.title: christmas card to 'pretty police woman ' arrives
text: this card , addressed to `` blonde , pretty police woman '' made it to leicestershire police pcso diana freeman .
this made it to my address !
well done royal mail .
merry christmas nicky and chris # thankyoupostie di
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: triumph motorcycle museum attracts thousands
text: thousands of people have visited a triumph motorcycle exhibition in its first two months of being open .
the factory visitor experience is at triumph 's uk manufacturing facility in hinckley .
it features the motorcycle from the great escape , jurassic world and mission impossible ii .
since opening on 1 november , they 've attracted over 3,500 visitors .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: m1 crash : lane to remain closed all day
text: recovery is completed and 3 lanes are now open # m1 northbound between j16 and j17 .
lane 1 will remain closed through the day until tonight when we can safely resurface the carriageway following damage from the fire .
no delays remaining
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: young muslims celebrate christmas with age uk
text: in a bid to spread some festive joy a group of young muslim men and women from leicester have been sharing a mince pie with visitors to age uk in the city .
despite not celebrating the christian holiday , roxana hussein told the bbc she wants to be part of the wider community and join in with the festivities .
age uk user eileen said it 's a time of year she 's `` grown out of '' and that she does n't really look forward to christmas .
however , she said meeting the young muslim visitors was `` lovely '' and she even got a present .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: police car chase comes to 'fiery halt '
text: this was the scene in stapleford , nottinghamshire , last night after a police chase ended in a car fire .
the car caught fire in nottingham road yesterday evening after being chased down the m1 .
two men were arrested nearby on sus of theft from a motor vehicle , nottinghamshire police said .
a police car was damaged when objects were thrown at it from the vehicle but no officers were injured .
stapleford town councillor , richard macrae , said the fire also damaged a nearby business , tailored to you .
the team assisted @ twitterid with a pursuit down the m1 .
the subject vehicle caught fire during the incident and came to a fiery halt in stapleford before it was abandoned
many thanks to @ twitterid and @ twitterid for their assistance at the scene
2 suspects were located nearby by or35 and remain in custody on sus of theft from motor vehicle .
@ twitterid od32 sustained damage from objects thrown at the car but managed to continue the pursuit and thankfully the handler and dogs escaped injury .
would you mind if i used the video on # staplefordfirestn facebook page ?
i 'll credit you if it 's ok ?
@ twitterid
@ twitterid ( sorry out the office today ! )
cheers pal .
no worries big man !
hope you have a great proper family christmas !
thanks to all involved great to see the pursuit safely resolved and offenders arrested .
great team effort !
especially the dog man and his ( unfriendly ! )
pooch , very difficult pursuit and circumstances , but good result 2 x 35 ! !
# oneteam
well done to all involved brilliant job !
glad @ twitterid handler and dogs are ok # thanklessjob # topteam # teamwork

adrian journalist leicester mercury 01216 3665220

documents.title: heavily pregnant prisoner escapes hospital
text: a pregnant prisoner is `` unlawfully at large '' after escaping from hospital .
sefora tanase is a prisoner at foston hall - police have said they `` urgently '' need to find her as there is concern for her safety .
the 19-year-old woman is in the latter stages of pregnancy .
she is of romanian nationality and has strong links to the birmingham area .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: m1 crash : delays 'for some time '
text: recovery taking place on # m1 northbound between j23 and j23a but likely to be difficult and protracted .
we also have extensive barrier damage which will need to be assessed .
lane 1 likely to be closed for quite some time .
delays on approach

documents.title: watch : what not to feed your dog at christmas
text: christmas should be a happy time for all , including the family dog .
i 've been to meet pug marty mcfly at his home in wigston to demonstrate what festive foods he should n't be eating .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: join us for today 's live coverage
text: happy christmas eve , eve , eve - also known as the last working day before christmas !
i 'll be writing your east midlands live page today along with dave wade .
if you 'd like to get in touch with us you can send an email or use facebook or twitter .
